headline: Microchip announces release of TimeProvider 4500 v3 grandmaster clock
summary: Microchip (MCHP) Technology announces the release of the TimeProvider 4500 v3 grandmaster clock designed to deliver sub-nanosecond accuracy for time distribution across 800 km long-haul optical transmission. This solution provides critical infrastructure operators with the missing link the industry has been waiting for in terms of complementary Positioning, Navigation and Timing. The TP4500 provides a resilient, terrestrial solution in the absence of Global Navigation Satellite Systems for preci
